Package cz.zcu.kiv.crce.metadata.service.validation

Interface ValidationResult

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CapabilityValidationResult, PropertyValidationResult, RequirementValidationResult, ResourceValidationResult
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractValidationResult, CapabilityValidationResultImpl, PropertyValidationResultImpl, ResourceValidationResultImpl

public interface ValidationResult
    Common validation result interface.
    Author:
    Jiri Kucera (jiri.kucera@kalwi.eu)

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityId

        String getEntityId()

      • setEntityId

        void setEntityId​(String id)

      • isContextValid

        boolean isContextValid()
        Indicates whether the whole validated content is valid.

        Validated content can be structured in hierarchy tree. If any validated entity is not valid, then the whole parent structure (which the entity is child of) is not valid.

        Returns:
        true if the whole validated content is valid, false otherwise.

      • setContextValid

        void setContextValid​(boolean valid)
        Sets validity of the validated content.
        Parameters:
        valid - content validity.
